answer:
Twinrix vaccine contains both Hep B and Hep A. Please call your local health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse who can review your son's immunization history and make recommendations on what he needs for full protection. You will find the number for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: My son had a hep-B or Twinrix vaccine at 9 years old in 2014. is it safe to get another Hep-B vaccine in 2018 at 13 years of age.
